oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Superintendent of Chattanooga public schools memoradum, 1961 April 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tenn.); Carmichael, Benjamin E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Memorandum from Bennie E. Carmichael, superintendent of Chattanooga public schools to Basil T. Welch, coordinator of school organization, regarding the impact of school integration on upcoming building projects.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
